Class Etape

java.lang.Object
modelisation.Etape
public class Etape extends Object
Represents a single floor (etape) of the dungeon. It stores all rooms on the floor and keeps track of neighbor rooms that are not visited yet.

  • Method Details

    • RefreshListNeighbor

      public void RefreshListNeighbor()
      Rebuilds the map of non-visited neighbour rooms. A room is considered a neighbour if it is adjacent to at least one visited room and has not been visited yet.

    • visite

      public RoomType visite(Coord set, Hero h)
      Visits a room at a given coordinate with the provided hero, only if that room is currently in the neighbour list.
